title: Short-Intensive Instructional Design Course for Transitioning Mathematics Instruction Online

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematical knowledge and basic proficiency in online learning tools
context.additional_context: Strengthening online class transition competencies through mobile-based intensive short courses for novice professionals in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more instructional strategies to effectively convey mathematical concepts in an online classroom setting.
Learners can create and apply at least two types of mobile-based microlearning materials to practical tasks.
Learners demonstrate the ability to incorporate peer feedback and develop improvement plans through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
